long_description: The handy Garmin External battery pack lets you power your Garmin device for up to an extra 20 hours for everything from long tours, 24-hour races or multiple days off the beaten tracks. Water-resistant power pack houses a 2200mAh lithium-Ion battery capable of recharging 5V devices; permanent mini USB connection enables versatile charging options. Stout, compact and lightweight construction makes it especially well suited for space- and weight-sensitive endeavors. Included silicone housing helps secure the battery to a bike frame without marring the finish and protects the battery from the elements; secures with a rip-and-stick strap. Battery pack can be recharged 3 different ways: via the included folding solar panel, USB connection or traditional plug. 100 - 240V adaptor plug features interchangeable plug tips that enables use in more than 150 countries throughout the world. Also included with the Garmin External battery pack is a female USB2 connector and a female mini USB to 3.5 x 1.1 convertor tip for even greater charging versatility. Included rip-and-stick strap easily attaches the folding solar panel to your pack, handlebar bag, pannier, tent, and more. Recharging times may vary: solar panel charges power pack to one-third within 5 hrs., fully within 15 hrs.; universal wall plug and USB charge power pack fully within 7 hrs.
short_description: The handy Garmin External battery pack lets you power your Garmin device for up to an extra 20 hours for everything from long tours, 24-hour races or multiple days off the beaten tracks.
